questions.question: In case of a standard Bravais lattice, what is the reciprocal of a reciprocal lattice?

answers.c: The original lattice from which the reciprocal was obtained

explanations.c: When worked out on paper, we can see that the reciprocal of a reciprocal lattice is the original lattice
